Hi Ron - do you have a test case that I could use to reproduce the problem?  
Also does it happen consistently or was it just a one off?  Unfortunately I 
can't see any AJDT classes in the stack trace to give me a clue as to what the 
problem might be, although it's obviously related to the save job.

Hi Sian,

It happens fairly regularly when I have incremental compilation turned on. I 
will try to narrow it down when I have a little more time...
As above, AJDT is not showing in the trace, so this might have been a JDT or platform problem. Please reopen if you see it with more recent versions of Eclipse.
